name: Stashpix
tag_list: ios, iphone, ipad, photo, photography, sharing, geocache, entertainment, discovery, scavenger-hunt
overview:
Stashipix is a photo-sharing application for iOS that allows people to find and leave behind photos wherever they go.

Instead of being broadcast over social networks, the photos only appear to Stashpix users at a stash’s location – with one twist: If a user creates or contributes to a stash, he can monitor the contents of the stash from anywhere in the world.

Stashes are not tied to a specific list of known places; they’re simply based on GPS coordinates and can be named descriptively, creatively, or even arbitrarily.

Stashpix is not a social network, and doesn’t rely on any others. There is no need to log in, create an account, or give up personal information. It’s simply a way for people to quickly find and leave behind photos wherever they go. Be sure to watch the 52-second video at www.stashpix.com for an entertaining overview of the app and its uses. The creative possibilities are endless.
